author: wmtan
body:
Bug fix:  The consumes interface for VersionedGsfElectronIdProducer was implemented incorrectly in that the wrong product type was used for three products.  The correct product type is edm::ValueMap<float>, not double.
This was not caught because the helper functions involved use getByLabel, not getByToken.  These helper classes use edm::EventBase, rather than edm::Event, and getByToken() is not implemented for edm::EventBase.  Fixing this larger issue is outside the scope of this bug fix.
title: Use correct type for consumes declaration
